verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

צַ֞ו <WH6680> Command אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel וְיִקְח֨וּ <WH3947> that they bring אֵלֶ֜יךָ <WH413> about שֶׁ֣מֶן <WH8081> oil זַ֥יִת <WH2132> olive זָ֛ךְ <WH2134> unto thee pure כָּתִ֖ית <WH3795> beaten לַמָּא֑וֹר <WH3974> for the light לְהַעֲלֹ֥ת <WH5927> to burn נֵ֖ר <WH5216> to cause the lamps תָּמִֽיד׃ <WH8548> continually

מִחוּץ֩ <WH2351> Without לְפָרֹ֨כֶת <WH6532> the vail הָעֵדֻ֜ת <WH5715> of the testimony בְּאֹ֣הֶל <WH168> in the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֗ד <WH4150> of the congregation יַעֲרֹךְ֩ <WH6186> order אֹת֨וֹ <WH853> אַהֲרֹ֜ן <WH175> shall Aaron מֵעֶ֧רֶב <WH6153> it from the evening עַד־ <WH5704> against בֹּ֛קֶר <WH1242> unto the morning לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD תָּמִ֑יד <WH8548> continually חֻקַּ֥ת <WH2708> [it shall be] a statute עוֹלָ֖ם <WH5769> for ever לְדֹרֹֽתֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH1755> in your generations

עַ֚ל <WH5921> and הַמְּנֹרָ֣ה <WH4501> candlestick הַטְּהֹרָ֔ה <WH2889> upon the pure יַעֲרֹ֖ךְ <WH6186> He shall order אֶת־ <WH853> הַנֵּר֑וֹת <WH5216> the lamps לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD תָּמִֽיד׃ <WH8548> continually פ

וְלָקַחְתָּ֣ <WH3947> And thou shalt take סֹ֔לֶת <WH5560> fine flour וְאָפִיתָ֣ <WH644> and bake אֹתָ֔הּ <WH854> thereof שְׁתֵּ֥ים <WH8147> thereof two עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה <WH6240> twelve חַלּ֑וֹת <WH2471> cakes שְׁנֵי֙ <WH8147> both עֶשְׂרֹנִ֔ים <WH6241> tenth deals יִהְיֶ֖ה <WH1961> become הַֽחַלָּ֥ה <WH2471> cake הָאֶחָֽת׃ <WH259> shall be in one

וְשַׂמְתָּ֥ <WH7760> And thou shalt set אוֹתָ֛ם <WH853> שְׁתַּ֥יִם <WH8147> them in two מַֽעֲרָכ֖וֹת <WH4634> rows שֵׁ֣שׁ <WH8337> six הַֽמַּעֲרָ֑כֶת <WH4635> on a row עַ֛ל <WH5921> and הַשֻּׁלְחָ֥ן <WH7979> table הַטָּהֹ֖ר <WH2889> upon the pure לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

וְנָתַתָּ֥ <WH5414> And thou shalt put עַל־ <WH5921> on הַֽמַּעֲרֶ֖כֶת <WH4635> upon [each] row לְבֹנָ֣ה <WH3828> frankincense זַכָּ֑ה <WH2134> pure וְהָיְתָ֤ה <WH1961> become לַלֶּ֙חֶם֙ <WH3899> that it may be on the bread לְאַזְכָּרָ֔ה <WH234> for a memorial אִשֶּׁ֖ה <WH801> [even] an offering made by fire לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto the LORD

בְּי֨וֹם <WH3117> he shall set it הַשַּׁבָּ֜ת <WH7676> Every sabbath בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> day הַשַּׁבָּ֗ת <WH7676> sabbath יַֽעַרְכֶ֛נּוּ <WH6186> in order לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD תָּמִ֑יד <WH8548> continually מֵאֵ֥ת <WH853> בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> [being taken] from the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel בְּרִ֥ית <WH1285> covenant עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> by an everlasting

וְהָֽיְתָה֙ <WH1961> shall be for לְאַהֲרֹ֣ן <WH175> And it shall be Aaron's וּלְבָנָ֔יו <WH1121> and his sons' וַאֲכָלֻ֖הוּ <WH398> and they shall eat בְּמָק֣וֹם <WH4725> place קָדֹ֑שׁ <WH6918> it in the holy כִּ֡י <WH3588> for קֹדֶשׁ֩ <WH6944> for it [is] most קָֽדָשִׁ֨ים <WH6944> holy ה֥וּא <WH1931> he ל֛וֹ מֵאִשֵּׁ֥י <WH801> made by fire יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD חָק־ <WH2706> statute עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> by a perpetual ס

וַיֵּצֵא֙ <WH3318> went out בֶּן־ <WH1121> And the son אִשָּׁ֣ה <WH802> woman יִשְׂרְאֵלִ֔ית <WH3482> of an Israelitish וְהוּא֙ <WH1931> he בֶּן־ <WH1121> whose father אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> [woman] and a man מִצְרִ֔י <WH4713> was an Egyptian בְּת֖וֹךְ <WH8432> among בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וַיִּנָּצוּ֙ <WH5327> strove together בַּֽמַּחֲנֶ֔ה <WH4264> in the camp בֶּ֚ן <WH1121> and this son הַיִּשְׂרְאֵלִ֔ית <WH3482> of the Israelitish וְאִ֖ישׁ <WH376> man הַיִּשְׂרְאֵלִֽי׃ <WH3481> woman's

וַ֠יִּקֹּב <WH5344> blasphemed בֶּן־ <WH1121> son הָֽאִשָּׁ֨ה <WH802> woman's הַיִּשְׂרְאֵלִ֤ית <WH3482> And the Israelitish אֶת־ <WH853> הַשֵּׁם֙ <WH8034> the name וַיְקַלֵּ֔ל <WH7043> [of the LORD] and cursed וַיָּבִ֥יאוּ <WH935> And they brought אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֑ה <WH4872> him unto Moses וְשֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> name אִמּ֛וֹ <WH517> (and his mother's שְׁלֹמִ֥ית <WH8019> [was] Shelomith בַּת־ <WH1323> the daughter דִּבְרִ֖י <WH1704> of Dibri לְמַטֵּה־ <WH4294> of the tribe דָֽן׃ <WH1835> Dan

וַיַּנִּיחֻ֖הוּ <WH3240> And they put בַּמִּשְׁמָ֑ר <WH4929> him in ward לִפְרֹ֥שׁ <WH6567> might be shewed לָהֶ֖ם <WH1992> like עַל־ <WH5921> that פִּ֥י <WH6310> that the mind יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3069> God פ
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

הוֹצֵ֣א <WH3318> Bring forth אֶת־ <WH853> הַֽמְקַלֵּ֗ל <WH7043> him that hath cursed אֶל־ <WH413> about מִחוּץ֙ <WH2351> without לַֽמַּחֲנֶ֔ה <WH4264> the camp וְסָמְכ֧וּ <WH5564> [him] lay כָֽל־ <WH3605> all הַשֹּׁמְעִ֛ים <WH8085> and let all that heard אֶת־ <WH853> יְדֵיהֶ֖ם <WH3027> their hands עַל־ <WH5921> on רֹאשׁ֑וֹ <WH7218> upon his head וְרָגְמ֥וּ <WH7275> stone אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָעֵדָֽה׃ <WH5712> and let all the congregation

וְאֶל־ <WH413> to בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel תְּדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> And thou shalt speak לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> Whosoever אִ֛ישׁ <WH376> anyone כִּֽי־ <WH3588> If יְקַלֵּ֥ל <WH7043> curses אֱלֹהָ֖יו <WH430> his God וְנָשָׂ֥א <WH5375> shall bear חֶטְאֽוֹ׃ <WH2399> his sin

וְנֹקֵ֤ב <WH5344> And he that blasphemeth שֵׁם־ <WH8034> the name יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD מ֣וֹת <WH4191> he shall surely יוּמָ֔ת <WH4191> be put to death רָג֥וֹם <WH7275> shall certainly יִרְגְּמוּ־ <WH7275> stone ב֖וֹ כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָעֵדָ֑ה <WH5712> [and] all the congregation כַּגֵּר֙ <WH1616> him as well the stranger כָּֽאֶזְרָ֔ח <WH249> as he that is born in the land בְּנָקְבוֹ־ <WH5344> when he blasphemeth שֵׁ֖ם <WH8034> the name יוּמָֽת׃ <WH4191> [of the LORD] shall be put to death
וְאִ֕ישׁ <WH376> And he כִּ֥י <WH3588> If יַכֶּ֖ה <WH5221> that killeth כָּל־ <WH3605> of any נֶ֣פֶשׁ <WH5315> any אָדָ֑ם <WH120> man מ֖וֹת <WH4191> shall surely יוּמָֽת׃ <WH4191> be put to death

וּמַכֵּ֥ה <WH5221> And he that killeth נֶֽפֶשׁ־ <WH5315> beast בְּהֵמָ֖ה <WH929> of an animal יְשַׁלְּמֶ֑נָּה <WH7999> shall make it good נֶ֖פֶשׁ <WH5315> for beast תַּ֥חַת <WH8478> Thahash נָֽפֶשׁ׃ <WH5315> life

וְאִ֕ישׁ <WH376> And if a man כִּֽי־ <WH3588> If יִתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> cause מ֖וּם <WH3971> a blemish בַּעֲמִית֑וֹ <WH5997> in his neighbour כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> he עָשָׂ֔ה <WH6213> as he hath done כֵּ֖ן <WH3651> so יֵעָ֥שֶׂה <WH6213> so shall it be done לּֽוֹ׃

שֶׁ֚בֶר <WH7667> Breach תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> Thahash שֶׁ֔בֶר <WH7667> for breach עַ֚יִן <WH5869> eye תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> Thahash עַ֔יִן <WH5869> for eye שֵׁ֖ן <WH8127> tooth תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> Thahash שֵׁ֑ן <WH8127> for tooth כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> it יִתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> as he hath caused מוּם֙ <WH3971> a blemish בָּֽאָדָ֔ם <WH120> in a man כֵּ֖ן <WH3651> so יִנָּ֥תֶן <WH5414> so shall it be done בּֽוֹ׃

וּמַכֵּ֥ה <WH5221> And he that killeth בְהֵמָ֖ה <WH929> a beast יְשַׁלְּמֶ֑נָּה <WH7999> he shall restore וּמַכֵּ֥ה <WH5221> it and he that killeth אָדָ֖ם <WH120> a man יוּמָֽת׃ <WH4191> he shall be put to death

מִשְׁפַּ֤ט <WH4941> manner of law אֶחָד֙ <WH259> Ye shall have one יִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> become לָכֶ֔ם כַּגֵּ֥ר <WH1616> as well for the stranger כָּאֶזְרָ֖ח <WH249> as for one of your own country יִהְיֶ֑ה <WH1961> become כִּ֛י <WH3588> for אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> for I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH430> your God

וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> spake מֹשֶׁה֮ <WH4872> And Moses אֶל־ <WH413> to בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> to the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <WH3478> of Israel וַיּוֹצִ֣יאוּ <WH3318> that they should bring forth אֶת־ <WH853> הַֽמְקַלֵּ֗ל <WH7043> him that had cursed אֶל־ <WH413> about מִחוּץ֙ <WH2351> out לַֽמַּחֲנֶ֔ה <WH4264> of the camp וַיִּרְגְּמ֥וּ <WH7275> and stone אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> אָ֑בֶן <WH68> him with stones וּבְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <WH3478> of Israel עָשׂ֔וּ <WH6213> did כַּֽאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> after צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> as the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> Moses פ
